p: The judge based his decision on Articles 5 th and 230 th of CF/88, which ensure that the right to life and human dignity is a duty of the state. Unsatisfied, the state of Rio de Janeiro and Fundação Saúde [Health Foundation] requested the order to be suspended in court. Among the reasons provided, it stand out that the decision did not take into account the multiple aspects that accrue from the absence of health workers belonging to risk groups from work that harm the health system.
